job.title: Software Engineer
job.industry: Sporting Goods,Computer Software,Information Technology and Services
job.description: pstrongTitle Software Engineer IIstrongppbrppstrongevo Purposestrong To make life better by building community and igniting the adventurous spirit that lives within us allppbrppevo is a leading multichannel retail brand that stands at the intersection of community commerce adventure sports and the outdoor lifestyle We offer a distinctlycurated product assortment and highlycrafted customer experiences At evo we define success differently than most balancing three goals equally 1 Building an iconic brand and business 2 creating an extraordinary place and path for our team and 3 leveraging our success to drive community impact We are a company driven by our purpose and values with a collective passion for community sports and lifestyle and a drive to together build something that lasts and mattersppbrppThe evo team is comprised of hardworking passionate individuals who believe curiosity humility and human connection are the foundation of progress We are driven by a belief that we are better together and we do our best work when we feel included valued supported and united in our purpose We share our successes and learn together when things dont go as plannedppnbspppstrongThe Jobstrongppbrppevo is looking for a midlevel Software Engineer to join our dynamic and growing Technology team As Software Engineer II on our Web Experience team youll work closely with endusers across the business and a crossfunctional team to improve our ecommerce website and the employeefacing tools used to manage the customer experienceppbrppstrongWhat you will dostrongpulliDesign implement and maintain webbased software and systems alongside other engineers bylilibuilding welldefined medium to largesized featuresliliparticipating in code reviewsliliinvestigating and fixing bugsliliwriting and executing unit testslilisupporting business usersliliProvide guidance and assistance to entrylevel and support engineers in the form of pair programming pull request reviews or other daily interactionsliliContribute to functional specifications for small featuresliliCommunicate progress to team leads with an emphasis on identifying blocking issuesliliCollaborate with thirdparty vendors to deliver solutions where applicableliliResearch new and evolving technologies reporting back to the team with concise findingsliulpbrppstrongWhat you will need strongpulliHolds a Bachelors or Masters degree in computer science or other related fieldliliHas at least two years fulltime professional experience in software engineeringliliDemonstrates strong comprehension of at least one objectoriented language preferably CliliDemonstrates strong comprehension of frontend web technologies including CSS HTML and ability to demonstrate understanding of cloud technologies such as Microsoft Azure or Amazon AWSliliExperience with Atlassian products Jira Service Desk Bitbucket etcliliExperience with the Kanban software development workflowliulpbrppemAt evo we are working to build and nurture a culture where equity inclusivity and compassion are inherent to how we operate and evolve We recognize and value the uniqueness of each individuals experiences and understand the power in the diversity of ideas and opinions Guided by our values and mission to promote more inclusive outdoor spaces we are working to develop a team that is equally representative of the community we hope to buildemppbrppemWhile there is more work to be done we are in the process of evolving our toolset We are committed to providing the space support and resources necessary for each individual to feel heard and valued If you are interested in contributing your unique voice to our journey we welcome you to applyemppnbspppemevonbspis an equal opportunity employer We believe the participation of individuals of diverse ages races religions cultures abilitiesnbspandnbsppersonalities will add to personal
